metadata.dc:author: López-Ibor Aliño, B
Moro Serrano, M
Campos Castelló, J
García de Solá, E
metadata.dc:description: A revision of the different techniques of measurement of intracranial pressure in childhood is presented. The value of pressure in the fontanel and mainly that of the transducer of dejection APT-16 is considered to be of interest in the neonatal period.
metadata.dc:title: Métodos de medida de la presión intracraneal en la edad pediátrica.
[Methods of measurement of intracranial pressure in childhood].
